dialogue: Mayor, our geologists have finished the surveys!

advice.early: But you haven't really built your city yet... Why expand already?
advice.no_space: Good idea! We're starting to run out of room for our future projects.
advice.expensive: Careful, this has a very high cost... Our economy will struggle to recover!
advice.default: It's a fine piece of land. What do you say?

title: DEED OF SALE - NEW TERRITORY
